required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on July 28, 2020
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.brief_title: Phase 2 Safety and Efficacy Study of Zilucoplan (RA101495) to Treat PNH Patients Who Have an Inadequate Response to Eculizumab
clinical_study.official_title: A Phase 2 Multicenter, Open-Label, Uncontrolled Study to Evaluate the Safety, Tolerability, Efficacy, Pharmacokinetics, and Pharmacodynamics of RA101495 in Subjects With Paroxysmal Nocturnal Hemoglobinuria Who Have an Inadequate Response to Eculizumab

brief_summary.textblock: The purpose of the study is to evaluate the safety and efficacy of RA101495 in patients with paroxysmal nocturnal hemoglobinuria (PNH) who have an inadequate response to eculizumab. Patients will be treated with RA101495 for 12 weeks.

primary_outcome.measure: Change-from-baseline in Serum Lactate Dehydrogenase (LDH) Levels.
primary_outcome.description: Change-from-baseline through Week 12 in serum lactate dehydrogenase (LDH) levels

secondary_outcome.description: Changes from baseline at each of the scheduled postbaseline time-points
Changes from baseline at each of the scheduled postbaseline time-points
Changes from baseline at each of the scheduled postbaseline time-points
Changes from baseline at each of the scheduled postbaseline time-points
Changes from baseline at each of the scheduled postbaseline time-points

Changes from baseline at each of the scheduled postbaseline time-points Hemoglobinuria was assessed using a urine colorimetric scoring system with a score of 1 through 10. Where 1 represents no hemoglobinuria and 10 represents maximum hemoglobinuria.

arm_group.description: Subjects will receive RA101495 at the dose of 0.3 mg/kg subcutaneously (SC) at Day 1 (loading dose) followed by a starting maintenance dose of 0.1 mg/kg daily SC

intervention.description: 0.3 mg/kg subcutaneously (SC) at Day 1 (loading dose) followed by a starting maintenance dose of 0.1 mg/kg daily SC

criteria.textblock:
Inclusion Criteria:
- Diagnosis of PNH by flow cytometry
- Inadequate response to eculizumab defined as having received eculizumab for at least 6 months plus a documented LDH level â‰¥ 1.5 x the upper limit of normal (ULN) and/or the presence of a known C5 mutation conferring resistance to eculizumab
Exclusion Criteria:
- History of meningococcal disease
- Current systemic infection or suspicion of active bacterial infection

certain_agreements.pi_employee: Principal Investigators are NOT employed by the organization sponsoring the study.
certain_agreements.restrictive_agreement: There is an agreement between the Principal Investigator and the Sponsor (or its agents) that restricts the PI's right to discuss or publish trial results after the trial is completed. Disclosure agreements are negotiated separately with each PI
